titleStmt.title: A treatise entitled the path waye to the towre of perfection. Compiled by Myles Huggarde, seruant to the Quenes most excellent maiestie
titleStmt.author: Huggarde, Miles.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Robert Caly within the precinct of the late dissolued house of the graye Freers, nowe conuerted to an hospital called Christes hospital,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title page: Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
